吴说区块链: 吴说获悉，香港证监会发布通函，表示准备好接受包括虚拟资产现货交易所买卖基金（虚拟资产现货ETF）在内的其他涉及虚拟资产的基金的认可申请。此外，证监会认可基金可直接在香港合规交易所上投资散户许可的虚拟资产代币；允许在传统的受监管期货交易所进行交易虚拟资产期货。https://www.wublock123.com/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=show&catid=10&id=21943

If it's not, clear your cache. chrome- F12> Chrome Developer Tools > Application tab > Storage in left tree> Clear site data.

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺
Basically every single file on Ledger Live has user trackers in them
I've cleaned a bunch and there's still 310 files
Ledger REALLY wants to know what you're doing on Ledger Live. Every click, every keystroke, every thing you look at gets tracked, logged and phoned home to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732542258698694875


REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺: Cleaning user tracking code from Ledger Live code and JFC the whole thing is a gigantic user tracking system
There's analytics trackers for nearly all events, on most screens. 
Ledger Live is a user data collection tool
How is this system even accepted by the crypto community?

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Think it was @NotChaseColeman who pointed on COIN and SOL are effectively the same trade.
While I agree with OP that COIN should be the better buy, SOL doesn’t have a pesky thing called “earnings” so there’s potential for it to trade at sillier peak valuations if it’s successful… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1738246854960427054


Uncle ⌐◧-◧: What would you rather buy?
$COIN: $40B market cap, profitable, well respected industry leader, 2-3 serious competitors, huge VC portfolio
$SOL: $50B market cap, unprofitable, diluting holders 7% per year, dozens of serious competitors with more sustainable business models
🤔
